title: "Smarter by the minute: Myriad of applications unlocked by artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "The July 2021 issue of IEEE/CAA Journal of Automatica Sinica features six articles that showcase the potential of machine learning in its various forms. The applications described in the studies range from advanced driver assistance systems and computer vision to image processing and collaborative robotics."
